faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have questions? We're here to help.

items.title: How accurate are the generated Chinese names?
items.description: Our names are generated using AI trained on traditional Chinese naming conventions and modern usage patterns. Each name is verified for cultural appropriateness and meaning.

items.title: Can I get different name options?
items.description: Yes! You can generate multiple name options and customize based on your preferences for meaning, sound, and style.

items.title: Do you provide meaning explanations?
items.description: Yes, each name comes with detailed explanations of individual characters, overall meaning, and cultural significance.

items.title: How do I pronounce my Chinese name?
items.description: We provide pinyin (romanization) and audio pronunciations for each name. Premium users get access to detailed pronunciation guides.

items.title: Are the names appropriate for official use?
items.description: Yes, all generated names follow proper Chinese naming conventions and are suitable for official documents, though we recommend verifying with local authorities for legal requirements.

items.title: Can I generate names for different genders?
items.description: Absolutely! You can specify gender preference, and our system will generate appropriate names accordingly.
